pivot.wtk.media
Class Movie

java.lang.Object
  pivot.wtk.media.Movie
All Implemented Interfaces:
Visual
public abstract class Movie
extends java.lang.Object
implements Visual

Abstract base class for movies. A movie is either a bitmapped "video" or a vector "animation".

Author:
tvolkert
